entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1 except minus 3 inland.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1 except minus 3 inland. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023
